item.title: Introduction to PrestaShop's Architecture
item.description: Introduction to PrestaShop’s Architecture PrestaShop is a big project, with several moving parts. In this article you will learn how they are structured and how they work together. Part of this article was originally published in 2019 as a blog post. It has been updated and adapted for documentation purposes here. Overview Basic overview of PrestaShop 1.7's architecture PrestaShop’s architecture can be separated in two main logical sections, represented as blue columns in the figure above:
